code: @Manual{,   title = {register: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance},   author = {Richard Telford},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/richardjtelford/register}, }

what: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance
title: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance
text: goal register make easy register attendance compulsory classes using canvas quizzes.

title: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance
text: can install development version register like :

title: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance
text: need canvas API token authentication. get token, log canvas installation (e.g. mitt.uib.), go Account >> Settings. Scroll slightly click “New access token”. Fill form click “Generate token”. show token. Make copy token (may span two lines) - canvas never show . open .Renviron file Edit file add CANVAS_API_KEY token, CANVAS_BASE_URL url canvas installation. .Renviron file look something like Save close file. can check everything set correctly throw error token url incorrect.

title: Makes a quiz on canvas to register attendance
text: Start loading package. function create_register() create quiz course access code; activate quiz ten minute deadline; produce QR code links quiz shows access code. argument needs set course_id. can find going home page course copying numbers end url. already quiz canvas, can activate activate_quiz() default, activate quiz immediately, set due date ten minutes time. can also make QR code existing quizzes. Use get_course_attendance() download registrations (can also see information canvas). summarise_attendance() plot_attendance() summarise plot result. summarise plot functions simple, use inspiration need something complex.
code: library(register) bio302 <- 57351 create_register(course_id = bio302) activate_quiz(course_id = bio302, quiz_id = 1234) plot_qrcode("https://mitt.uib.no/courses/57351/quizzes/57912", main = "Do this quiz")

title: Activate quiz — activate_quiz
text: Activates pre-existing quiz (perhaps made create_quiz()) setting unlock time, due time publishes .

title: Activate quiz — activate_quiz
code: activate_quiz(   course_id,   quiz_id,   unlock_at,   time_open = minutes(10),   access_code = NULL )

title: Activate quiz — activate_quiz
text: course_id id number course. Go course home page number end url. quiz_id id number quiz. number end quiz url. unlock_at date-time unlock quiz - defaults current time (Canvas accepts times ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2011-10-21T18:48Z). can use iso8601() format date-time correctly. time_open time keep quiz open (minutes) - default ten minutes. Set NULL keep quiz open access_code Optional access code quiz

title: Activate quiz — activate_quiz
text: quiz object (invisible)

what: A list with adjective and nouns — adjective_noun
title: A list with adjective and nouns — adjective_noun
text: list adjective nouns

title: A list with adjective and nouns — adjective_noun
A list with adjective and nouns — adjective_noun
text: list norsk list Norwegian adjectives nouns (mammals birds) without special characters. english list English adjectives nouns.

title: Collate quiz questions parameters — collate_question_params
text: Collates quiz question parameters.

title: Collate quiz questions parameters — collate_question_params
code: collate_question_params(   question_name = "qn",   question_text = "Please enter the passcode",   question_type = "short_answer_question",   position = 1,   correct_comments = "Thankyou",   incorrect_comments = "Please check your passcode carefully",   answers = NULL )

title: Collate quiz questions parameters — collate_question_params
text: question_name Name question question_text Question text question_type Type question position Integer setting question order correct_comments Response correct answer incorrect_comments Response incorrect answer answers correct answer(s). Optional. Can vector list answer_text optionally answer_score.

title: Collate quiz questions parameters — collate_question_params
text: list

title: Collate quiz questions parameters — collate_question_params
text: information parameter canvas API documentation

title: Collate quiz parameters — collate_quiz_params
text: Collates processes quiz parameters.

title: Collate quiz parameters — collate_quiz_params
code: collate_quiz_params(   title = glue("Registration {today()}"),   description = "Please press submit to register attendence",   quiz_type = "graded_survey",   unlock_at = NULL,   due_at = NULL,   ... )

title: Collate quiz parameters — collate_quiz_params
text: title Title quiz. Defaults "Registration {Date}" description Description text quiz_type Type quiz unlock_at Optional. Set using iso8601(). due_at Optional. Set using iso8601(). ... Extra parameters. See details

title: Collate quiz parameters — collate_quiz_params
text: list

title: Collate quiz parameters — collate_quiz_params
text: information parameter canvas API documentation

title: Create quiz — create_quiz
text: canvas Authentication using vvcanvas::canvas_authenticate() course_id id number course. Go course home page number end url. quiz_params Quiz parameters. can make collate_quiz_params()

title: Create quiz — create_quiz
text: list canvas quiz.

title: Create quiz question — create_quiz_question
text: canvas Authentication using vvcanvas::canvas_authenticate() course_id id number course. Go course home page number end url. quiz_id id number quiz. can extract output create_quiz(). quiz_question_params Quiz question parameters. can make collate_question_params()

title: Create quiz question — create_quiz_question
text: list canvas quiz.

what: Create attendance quiz and qr code — create_register
title: Create attendance quiz and qr code — create_register
text: Create attendance quiz qr code

title: Create attendance quiz and qr code — create_register
code: create_register(   course_id,   accesscode = random_passcode(adjective_noun_list = adjective_noun$norsk),   quiz_params = digit_code(),   quiz_id )

title: Create attendance quiz and qr code — create_register
text: course_id id number course. Go course home page number end url. accesscode accesscode. Defaults four digit code. quiz_params Quiz parameters. can make collate_quiz_params() quiz_id Optional id existing quiz activate.

title: Digit code — digit_code
text: Generates four digit code leading zeros necessary

title: Get course attendance — get_course_attendance
text: Collates attendance records student.

title: Get course attendance — get_course_attendance
text: course_id id number course. Go course home page number end url. pattern Regular expression identify registration quizzes. attendance Output get_course_attendance(). lowest Show n students lowest attendance (prevent plot overwhelming). Use Inf show students.

title: Get course attendance — get_course_attendance
text: data.frame

title: ISO8601 — iso8601
text: Formats date ISO8601 date time format timezone.

title: ISO8601 — iso8601
text: datetime Date-time object (POSIXct class) example made lubridate::now(). offset Offset period example made lubridate::minutes().

title: Plot qrcode with access code — plot_qrcode
text: url url make QR code col colours qrcode main Plot title code_text Access code title accesscode accesscode

title: Make a random passcode — random_passcode
